223638.「……クックック。\n サタンの魔眼石を 知っているか？\n<br>\n「大悪魔:
...Cookek. Do you know what Satan's Eye Stone is? It's a beautiful natural magic stone that reminds me of the
eyes of a giant demon. If you want it, come to me.

223640.「……ほう そなた。\n この魔眼石に 気に入られたようだな。\n 好奇の目で:
...Well, you. It seems that this Eyasor stone has taken a liking to you. It is staring at you with curiosity. This
stone is destined for you. I'll sell it to you for a special price of 5,000 gold. Would you like to buy it?

223642.「金が 足りないようだ……。\n もう少し サイフを重くしてから\n また 来る:
It seems I don't have enough money.
You can come back when you have a
heavier wallet.

223644.「クックック……受け取るがいい。: I like the Cooke Cook receive.

223646.「……そなた ゼクレスへ向かうようだな。\n あの国は 悪意の都と呼ばれている。:
...It seems that you are on your way to
Zechres. That country is called the
City of Malice. Cooke, be careful.

223648.「……クックック そうきたか。\n ならば １０００ゴールドで 売ってやる。\n:
...Cookek, you're right. Then I'll sell
it to you for 1000 gold. You want to
buy it?<yesno><break>

223650.「クックック……受け取るがいい。: I like the Cooke Cook receive.

223652.「そうか……。\n ならば 立ち去れ……。: I see... Then get outta here...

223656.「……クックック。\n サタンの魔眼石は 大悪魔の瞳を思わせる\n 美しき 天然:
...Cooke. Satan's Eye Stone is a beautiful natural magic stone reminiscent of the eyes of a giant
demon.

229568.「あらん。アナタ この辺りじゃ見かけないわね。\n 情報通のアタイが イロイロ:
Oh, I haven't seen you around here.
Shall I, the well-informed me, tell
you all about it?
<select_mem>
The Demon World Situation
The Great Demon King
The Oracle

About Zechres

No, thank you.

229570.「ほかに 何か アタイに聞きたいことある？\n<select_mem>\n魔界の:
Is there anything else you want to ask
me?
<select_mem>
The Demon World Situation
The Great Demon King
The Oracle
About Abyss Jewel
About Fortress Valdista
About Zechres
About Sand City Farazard
No, thank you.
<select_end>

229572.「あらん。そんなことも知らずに よく魔界で\n 生き延びてこれたわね。いいこと…:
Oh, no. How did you survive in Demon World without knowing that? The good news is that Demon World is made up of
three particularly powerful nations. To the west is Fortress Valdista, a land of iron blood and violence; to
the east, Zechres, a city of malice; to the south, Farazard, a new land of chaos; and here, in front of
Demongate, is a neutral zone, not under the control of any one country. The outlaws have taken over, though.

229574.「魔界の国には それぞれ 魔王がいるんだけど\n さらに その頂点に 魔界全土を:
Each country in the Demon World has its own Demon King, and at the top of the Demon King is the Great Demon King
who rules the entire Demon World. However, since the death of the previous Great Demon King, the
position has been vacant, and since then, the Demon World has been in a state of confusion.

229576.「あちらに そびえ立つ デモンマウンテンの\n 頂上に住まう 魔界の最古老よ。\:
The oldest of the Demon World, residing atop the towering Demon Mountain over there. He is the only
one who has access to the source of the great darkness. He has great influence in the Demon World and has
the right to appoint the Great Demon King. I've never heard of anyone seeing him, though.

229578.「武力にモノをいわせ 魔界の国々を滅ぼして\n 領土を拡大しつづけてきた 軍事国:
A military state that has continued to expand its territory by destroying the countries of the Demon World with its
military might. Power is everything! That's what it's all about. Fortress Valdista is located in the western
mountainous region. But it's a dangerous country where war is the order of the day, so don't go there if
you don't want to die.

229580.「魔界で 最も古い伝統を有する国よ。\n 高貴な血統の貴族たちが 住んでてね。\:
It is the country with the oldest traditions in the Demon World. It is populated by noblemen of noble blood.
They have closed off diplomatic relations and maintain their isolation. Zechres is just beyond the
eastern forest, but it's a country full of sarcastic and exclusive people, so don't go there.

229582.「チカラを持った３国の中では 最も新しい国よ。\n 混沌の国といわれるように 雑:
It is the newest of the three countries with power. It is a land of chaos, a place of miscellaneous and
fast-changing peoples. If you go to the southern desert, you should be able to get there, but it is said that
there are slums and crime is rampant, so it is best not to go there.

229584.「あらん。エンリョしなくてもいいのに。\n そんなんじゃ 魔界で 生き残れないわ:
Oh no. You didn't have to do that. You
won't survive in Demon World that way!

229586.「バルディスタ軍が ついに アストルティアへ\n 攻め入ったと 聞いたのですが…:
I heard that Valdista's army finally invaded Astoltia, but for some reason, they seem to have retreated. Astoltia
is a terrible place to drive the Valdista army into retreat. After all, it is best to live in Demon World.

229588.「ギュフフ……。\n おまえ すこし ニンゲンのにおいする。\n うまそうだ……:
Goof. You smell a little human. You
look delicious.

229590.「どいつも こいつも バカだね！\n アタイが 大魔王になるんだよッ！\n<br:
Everyone of them is an idiot! I'm going to become the Great Demon King! I'll make a contract with the source
of the great darkness and obtain eternal youth and beauty! Oh-ho-ho!

229592.「ヘッヘッ さては アンタ……\n ここに はじめて来たな？\n キョロキョロし:
So you've been here for the first time, huh? I recognized you from your KyoroKyoro. If so, you should open the
Abyss Gate near the entrance of the settlement, so you can go back anytime with Abyss Jewel. Also, if you want to
know more about the area, ask Mr. Amanda near the entrance. I'm sure she can tell you all about it.

229594.「ぷるぷる……\n マデサゴーラさまの治世は よかったなァ。\n 今よりは いく:
The reign of the Madesagora was good, wasn't it? It was a little better than now. Now that the Great Demon King is
gone, everyone is running amok and the Demon World is a lawless zone. If you're not careful, you'll get eaten
by a passerby. Oh, you don't think you're going to take my life too? Stop it, I'm a beautiful KunaiSlime! Maybe
if you eat him, you'll get a stomach ache!

229596.「なぜ 大審門は 開かねえんだ！\n 大魔王になれる資格者が そろっていれば\n:
Why won't the Demongate open? Shouldn't it open if there are enough people qualified to become the Great
Demon King? Since I'm the most promising candidate to become the next Great Demon King, the conditions
should be fulfilled! Hurry up and open the door!

229598.「ケケケ…… ここは 大審門前の集落。\n 魔界の最高峰 デモンマウンテンの入り:
Kekekeke This is the village before Demongate. This is the entrance to Demon Mountain, the highest peak in
Demon World. It's a place where ambitious people who want to be the Great Demon King and those who just
want to be onlookers and do business with them, and all sorts of people like that gather.

241609.「ららら～♪ るるる～♪\n<br>\n「……私が 歌っているのは ずいぶん前に:
The song I am singing is Holy Poetry, a secret song of Astoltia that I learned from a sage a long time ago.
It is true that it was effective against demon miasma over there, but demon miasma in Demon World is too
strong to be eliminated by this song. But I like this song. I find myself humming it without meaning. I can't
stand up to demon miasma....

243690.大審門は かたく 閉ざされている。\n<br>\n……<pc>は 大審門に\n刻:
The Demongate has been stubbornly
closed. <pc> reads the
inscription on the Demongate.

245090.「ククク……サタンの魔眼石が ほしくはないか？\n 大悪魔の瞳を 思わせる\n:
Wouldn't you like to have the Satan's Eye Stone? It is a beautiful and natural magic stone that reminds you
of the eyes of the great demon.

245446.「そこの どデカイ大審門は その名の通り\n 大魔王の資格を 審判する役目を持つ:
As the name implies, the large Demongate there is responsible for judging the qualifications of the
Great Demon King. When the candidates for Great Demon King gather here, the road to Demon Mountain will finally be
opened. The last time it was opened was a long time ago, and the battle was fierce. I wasn't born there.

245447.<center>相克する 天運を持つ者 集いし時\n大魔王への道は 開かれる:
When those with conflicting fortunes
gather together, the path to the Great
Demon King opens.

246548.「ああ ついに 大審門が開いた！ \n 次の大魔王が決まれば 魔界の争乱もしずま:
Ah, finally, Demongate has opened!Once the next Great Demon King is chosen, the strife in the Demon World will be
settled and a slightly better time will come. Please pray for a Great Demon King who is strong, smart,
witty, a little bit kind, and respectable.

246549.「ギュフフ……。たくさん 死んだ……。\n くさっていく 肉のにおい……\n ギ:
Gyuhuhu. So many dead. The smell of
rotting flesh.

246550.「大いなる闇の根源と 契約して \n 永遠の若さと美貌を 手に入れたかったが……:
I made a contract with the source of the great darkness and received eternal youth and beauty, but I'm
getting off! I can't live long enough to compete with that Demon Queen Valeria! Mudraker's mud pack is enough
for me!

246551.「こいつは 波乱の幕開けだな……！\n 我先にと 駆け出した 血気盛んな候補者か:
This is the beginning of a storm! We were beaten by Demon Queen Valeria, a hot-blooded Candidate who rushed out
first. Thanks to our late start, the survivors are climbing Demon Mountain. Ha ha. Luck is a part of the equation,
huh? If you're the Great Demon KingCandidate, you might as well get on with it. I don't care if you beat
me to it!

246553.「ぷるぷる……！\n 魔王ヴァレリアの矛で あっという間に\n みんな 死んじま:
Plop! Demon Queen Valeria's contradiction killed everyone in a flash! But I heard that many more and
more terrible trials are waiting for us in Demon Mountain. Oh, you're not going to take my life, are you? I'm
not interested in the Great Demon King! I want another Slime to be crushed to pieces!

246554.「つつつ ついに 大審門を 開いてやったぜ！\n お お おっ……オレさまはっ\:
I finally opened Demongate! Oh, oh, oh, I'm the most promising candidate for the next Great Demon King! But
true, the real punching comes later! If you want, you can climb the mountain and defeat Demon Queen
Valeria first!

246555.「ケケケ……。ここは 大審門前の集落。 \n 魔界の最高峰 デモンマウンテンの入:
Kekeke. This is the village before Demongate.This is the entrance to Demon Mountain, the highest peak in
Demon World. At last, Demongate has opened! It's the beginning of the game for the title of Great Demon King.
Hate them! And take it from each other! Kekekekekekekekekekekekekekekek ekekekekekekekekekeke!

246556.「ここも だいぶ 落ち着いてきたな。\n 大魔王候補たちは そろそろ 頂上か？\:
Things have calmed down a lot here. Are the candidates for Great Demon King about to be crowned? I wonder who
will be chosen.

248327.「大審門が閉まっている風景に 慣れていたもので\n 開いていると なんだか ソワ:
I was used to seeing the Demongate
closed, so when it is open, I feel a
bit nervous.

248328.「ドロヌーバの 泥パックが\n さいきん 値上がりしてるんだよ。\n ったく こ:
Mudraker's mud packs have been going
up in price lately. I'm so annoyed.

248329.「やっと 大審門が開いたってのに\n 大魔王は 決まらなかったらしいな。\n や:
Demongate finally opened, but I heard that the Great Demon King was not selected. Oh well, Demon World is also
short of talent. But now Demongate's role is gone for the time being. I'll miss this place too.

248330.「ぷるぷる……！\n オイラ おいしいスライムじゃないズラァ！\n く…くわない:
Slime! I am not a tasty Slime! Don't
nibble on it!<yesno><break>

248331.「アア なんだ 襲う気はねェのか。\n びっくり させんなズラ……。\n<br>:
Oh, what, you're not going to attack me? Don't surprise me. I hope that Demon World will soon become a safe
and secure place where people don't have to worry about being eaten by passersby.

248332.<feel_think_lv2>「次に 大審門が閉まって 開くのは\n いつに:
<feel_think_lv2>I wonder when Demongate will close and
open next? It's so boring now that the
festival is over.

251054.「ケケケ…… ここは 大審門前の集落。\n 魔界の最高峰 デモンマウンテンの入り:
Kekekeke This is the village before Demongate. This is the entrance to Demon Mountain, the highest peak in
Demon World.

251055.「ウッ…ウワァー やめてくれズラァ！: Ugh wow, don't do that, Zula!

251590.「オレは 魔界各地を 旅してまわってるんだが\n そこにあるような扉を どうして:
I've been traveling all over the Demon World, but I just can't seem to open the doors that are there. I've been
all over Demon World and I can't find a key for that door, so there must be something more special and amazing
than a key.

252027.「あらん イイものを 持ってるじゃない。\n そのアビスジュエルはね…… 魔界で:
Well, you've got a nice one. The Abyss Jewel is a precious jewel that only a few people in Demon World have. There
are gates called Abyss Gate all over Demon World. Using the Abyss Jewel, you can move to any place where the
gate is opened in an instant. Isn't that convenient? However, it is said that Abyss Gate can be blocked by
those who have the power to do so. So it's not always possible to use it.

252694.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight
